name: Wertago
tag_list: nightlife, lifestyle, iphone, mobile, android, mobile-apps, bars, clubs, lounges, travel, entertainment, social-networking
overview:
Wertago is the mobile app for true nightlifers.

With Wertago 2.0, the award-winning mobile app for NIGHTLIFE… See what’s happening at the hottest bars, clubs, and lounges in town. Find out where to go (wertago!) for the perfect night. Coordinate with friends and flirt with sexy nightlifers. View real party pics. Discover new DJs and promoters. And more…

Wertago gives you location-based info and real-time ratings & reviews on nightlife venues near you, and provides full nightlife event listings, party flyers, and guestlists. Full-featured messaging keeps you connected with other socialites, old friends and new. And party status lets you broadcast the vibe (directly to Twitter, if you like). You can also browse pics, upload your own, and see who likes to go where. It’s like a yelp or citysearch specifically for nightlife, combined with the best features of social networking apps like facebook and myspace, perfected for the mobile iPhone experience!

Whatever your scene is, from latin/salsa to heavy metal/rock, hip-hop to jazz/soul/blues, alternative to electronica, country to reggae/ska/soca, you can find other like-minded nightlifers to vibe with.

Promoters have in-app access to Wertago’s event portal, where you can upload party details and flyers, manage guestlists, and announce your new parties via Twitter.

Wertago keeps getting better, too, with new features added regularly. Join the hottest mobile community of nightlifers today!

Wertago is available as a native app on Android and iPhone, and as a mobile web app on other platforms (http://m.wertago.com).
